title: How to Make Eucalyptus Potpourri

steps.headline: Dry any ingredients that are not already dry.
steps.description: There should be no moisture or you risk mildew growth.

steps.headline: Thoroughly mix together all of the ingredients in a large bowl.
Put the potpourri mixture into a dark, covered container.
steps.description: Put away into storage for 4 - 6 weeks. Stir it every few days to distribute the essences.

steps.headline: Use as required.
steps.description: When you are satisfied that the mixture is scented to your liking, it can be put into potpourri bowls or inside sachets. Keep wherever you would like this scent to permeate the air.

text: Dry any ingredients that are not already dry. There should be no moisture or you risk mildew growth. Thoroughly mix together all of the ingredients in a large bowl.  Put the potpourri mixture into a dark, covered container. Put away into storage for 4 - 6 weeks. Stir it every few days to distribute the essences. Use as required. When you are satisfied that the mixture is scented to your liking, it can be put into potpourri bowls or inside sachets. Keep wherever you would like this scent to permeate the air.
